# WHO-5 Well-Being Index

## Administration

Over the last two weeks, how often have you...

Response options:
- All of the time (5)
- Most of the time (4)
- More than half of the time (3)
- Less than half of the time (2)
- Some of the time (1)
- At no time (0)

## Items

1. ...felt cheerful and in good spirits?
2. ...felt calm and relaxed?
3. ...felt active and vigorous?
4. ...woke up feeling fresh and rested?
5. ...felt that your daily life has been filled with things that interest you?

## Scoring

- Raw score: sum items (0-25)
- Index score: raw * 4 (0-100)

## Common Cutoff (Verify Locally)

- Index score <50 is commonly used to indicate low well-being and possible depression.
- Raw score â‰¤13 corresponds to <50 on the index.

Confirm local guidance and scoring conventions.
